title: Best Gaming Mouse
description: We own this ourselves, and it performs just as well as the Logitech PRO X SUPERLIGHT 2—without the extra $120 price tag. Super accurate for flicking chess moves!

title: Wooden Chess Board
description: This 3-in-1 wooden chess set is compact and easy to take anywhere. Honestly it’s great quality for the price. If you don't yet have a chess board, this is a great choice for your first one.

title: Magnetic Wooden Chess Board
description: This is a solid wooden chess set. Honestly magnetic pieces are so satisfying to put in place.

title: Anime E-Sports Mousepad
description: It's really cheap, there is no reason not to buy one if you don't have one yet.

title: E-Sports Mousepad
description: It's really cheap, like there is no reason not to buy one if you don't have one yet.

title: Thermal Water Bottle
description: Similar products cost like 30 dollars at my local stores, this has served me well.

title: RGB Light Strip
description: I highly recommend a light strip behind your desk to ease eye strain during long screen time.

title: Fast Charging USB C Cable
description: Cheap but pretty reliable USB cable.

title: Digital Thermometer
description: A.C.A.S shouldn't turn your PC into a space heater—haha! But hey, at least you get a cheap room temperature monitor.

title: Portable Table Fan
description: It's surprisingly powerful and has an impressive battery life—perfect for those intense, sweat-inducing chess matches.

title: HiFi KZ Pro Earphones
description: The KZ brand is amazing. If you end up getting the bluetooth AZ09 extension, it has the funny Chinese bluetooth lady voice lol.

title: Anime Figure PVC
description: For when your chess game needs a little extra... um, 'motivation.' It'll stare at you while you play chess (`・ω・´)

title: Anime Figure PVC
description: For when your chess game could use a little... um, 'encouragement.' It'll watch you struggle through your moves, offering zero advice（〃・・〃)

title: Anime Figure PVC
description: For those moments when your chess game needs a bit of... um, 'inspiration.' It’ll silently judge your moves while you play (〃￣ω￣〃)

title: Mechanical Keyboard Wired/2.4GHz/BT
description: AJAZZ is a trusted brand, known for making some of the best mice on the market, offering precision, comfort, and reliability for both gaming and everyday use.
